website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm Instax Mini LiPlay is a fun point-and-shoot camera with a built-in printer that works with Instax film.
pros: Instax Mini film is readily available
cons: Image quality isn't competitive with flagship smartphones

customer_reviews.title: fun and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to use but it’s hard sometimes to connect via bluetooth. I deleted the app and downloaded again. Amazon USA offers the same for a cheaper price wish I bought it there, founded at cheaper price in a Fujifilm store in Thailand too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Instax camera
customer_reviews.text: The ability to see the image before exposing the film on these hybrid Instax cameras makes for a completely different experience. While you loose the sometimes unpredictable nature of the analogue cameras, you're not going to use up any film on iffy shots with this. That said, the built in camera on this is rather average. It's perfect for handing to someone for a quick picture, taking group shots etc, but it really shines as a printer with images taken with a good smartphone. I'd definitely take the versatility of this model over a print-only Instax device though. It's easy to use, versatile and convenient overall. A good addition to the range.
customer_reviews.author: GloomyJD

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending the extra for this model, so many more features than the original
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best Instax camera money can buy - worth spending the extra on this model. It connects to your phone so you can print directly from your phone onto Instax film. You can also shoot on the camera multiple times before choosing which shot to print, which is so helpful because on the old Instax cameras thej automatically print every shot even if its over exposed or too dark. So this one is the best and I’d highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G. Rance

customer_reviews.title: LOvely camera
customer_reviews.text: Santa got this for my daughter at Christmas. It is so easy to use and has the huge bonus of having a micro SD card so not everything needs to be printed! She loves it!! Slight downside is that the film is expensive, hence the importance of SD card versus earlier models that ONLY printed!
customer_reviews.author: Nmaca

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of a printer and camera in one, but as the first one to launch from Instax, this is definitely a disappointment. The pictures come out extremely dark and if not, yellow. I’ve been using Instax for years now so I know what the good pictures turn out to be like. Didn’t even use up all my Instax films as this is too disappointing. Definitely not recommended.

product_meta.title: instax mini LiPlay, Elegant Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Elegant BlackLiPlay may be the smallest instax ever, but this all new 2-in-1 hybrid instant camera and printer can throw an almighty punch. For starters this isn't just an instant camera. It's also a smart little printer, so you can print straight from your Smartphone instantly too. Then there's the LCD screen, the sound recording setting, the ability to control the camera directly from your Smartphone via the app and finally some eye-catching frames and filters. All printed on credit card-sized instax mini film. Isn't it time to unleash your playful side and make some noise.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth image transfer from your smartphone
Multiple filters, frame designs, plus voice playback from print
